description:
This dashboard is from the RapDev Terraform integration purchased from the marketplace. For any customizations, the dashboard must be cloned and then the clone can be edited. 

If there are any questions or further assistance is required, please reach out datadog-engineering@rapdev.io.
title: RapDev Terraform Dashboard

definition.title: Users: Can Manage Tokens (Org Id, Username)
Teams: Can Update Org Access (Org Id, Team Name)
Teams: Can Update API Token (Org Id, Team Name)
Users: Can Create Orgs (Org Id, Username)
"Is Plan Only" Runs (Workspace, True or False)
"Is Refresh Only" Runs (Workspace, True or False)

requests.q: max:rapdev.terraform.org.workspace.last_updated{$org_id,$workspace_name} by {tf_workspace_name, tf_org_id, tf_workspace_tf_version, tf_workspace_source, tf_workspace_environment, tf_workspace_execution_mode}

definition.title: Users: Is Service Account (Org Id, Username)
Teams: Can Update Visibility (Org Id, Team Name)
Teams: Can Update Membership (Org Id, Team Name)
Teams: Can Destroy (Org Id, Team Name)

definition.content:
**STATUS KEY:**

 0 --> Pending

 1 --> Applied

 2 --> Planned and Finished

 3 --> Discarded

 4 --> Canceled

 5 --> Errored

6 --> Unsupported (Contact RapDev)

requests.q: max:rapdev.terraform.org.workspace.latest_run.days_since{*} by {tf_workspace_name, tf_run_id, tf_run_has_changes, tf_run_is_plan_only, tf_run_source, tf_run_trigger_reason}
max:rapdev.terraform.org.workspace.run.status{*} by {tf_workspace_name, tf_run_id, tf_run_has_changes, tf_run_is_plan_only, tf_run_source, tf_run_trigger_reason}

definition.content:
**STATUS KEY:**

 0 --> Idle

 1 --> Busy

 2 --> Exited

 3 --> Errored

 4 --> Unsupported (Contact RapDev)
